prompt:
Best time to book LGA→ZRH within next 60 days.
Include: fare ranges (USD), typical booking window (days before departure),
peak/holiday effects, basic bag policy differences, and 1–2 concrete examples.
Return STRICT JSON: {
  "origin": string, "destination": string, "window_days": number,
  "best_window_days": [min,max], "fare_low_usd": number, "fare_high_usd": number,
  "notes": string
}

message.content:
{
  "origin": "LGA",
  "destination": "ZRH",
  "window_days": 30,
  "best_window_days": [21, 45],
  "fare_low_usd": 500,
  "fare_high_usd": 900,
  "notes": "Booking 21-45 days in advance typically yields the best fares. Peak holiday periods (e.g., Christmas, New Year) may see higher prices, often exceeding $1,200. Basic bag policies vary by airline, with many offering one free carry-on but charging for checked bags. Example: A fare of $550 can be found if booked 30 days out, while last-minute fares may exceed $1,000."
}
